sources.title: Memorial Day (1998) Science best kept secret is man's greatest danger - Action Thriller
sources.description:
When a brilliant satellite specialist (Mongo Brownlee) feels betrayed by the system, he joins a dangerous operation targeting a critical military installation. Can authorities stop his rogue mission before time runs out?

metadata.Plot: An embittered satellite expert gets the opportunity for revenge against the USA by aiding terrorists in a plan to destroy the country's military base.
metadata.Actors: Mongo Brownlee, Frederick Coffin, Oscar Dillon
